005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModelInstanceAbsolute;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.DefaultCardinalityConstraint;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
014
015/**
016 * Represents a rule requiring a Metaschema assembly data instance to have
017 * elements with a minimum and/or maximum occurrence.
018 */
019public interface ICardinalityConstraint extends IConfigurableMessageConstraint {
020  /**
021   * Retrieve the required minimum occurrence of the target instance. If
022   * specified, this value must be less than or equal to the value of
023   * {@link IModelInstanceAbsolute#getMaxOccurs()} and greater than
024   * {@link IModelInstanceAbsolute#getMinOccurs()}.
025   *
026   * @return a non-negative integer or {@code null} if not defined
027   */
028  @Nullable
029  Integer getMinOccurs();
030
031  /**
032   * Retrieve the required maximum occurrence of the target instance. If
033   * specified, this value must be less than the value of
034   * {@link IModelInstanceAbsolute#getMaxOccurs()} and greater than or equal to
035   * {@link IModelInstanceAbsolute#getMinOccurs()}.
036   *
037   * @return a non-negative integer or {@code null} if not defined
038   */
039  @Nullable
040  Integer getMaxOccurs();
041
042  @Override
043  default <T, R> R accept(IConstraintVisitor<T, R> visitor, T state) {
044    return visitor.visitCardinalityConstraint(this, state);
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Create a new constraint builder.
049   *
050   * @return the builder
051   */
052  @NonNull
053  static Builder builder() {
054    return new Builder();
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Provides a builder pattern for constructing a new
059   * {@link ICardinalityConstraint}.
060   */
061  final class Builder
062      extends AbstractConfigurableMessageConstraintBuilder<Builder, ICardinalityConstraint> {
063    private Integer minOccurs;
064    private Integer maxOccurs;
065
066    private Builder() {
067      // disable construction
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Use the provided minimum occurrence to validate associated targets.
072     *
073     * @param value
074     *          the expected occurrence
075     * @return this builder
076     */
077    public Builder minOccurs(int value) {
078      this.minOccurs = value;
079      return this;
080    }
081
082    /**
083     * Use the provided maximum occurrence to validate associated targets.
084     *
085     * @param value
086     *          the expected occurrence
087     * @return this builder
088     */
089    public Builder maxOccurs(int value) {
090      this.maxOccurs = value;
091      return this;
092    }
093
094    @Override
095    protected Builder getThis() {
096      return this;
097    }
098
099    @Override
100    protected void validate() {
101      super.validate();
102
103      if (getMinOccurs() == null && getMaxOccurs() == null) {
104        throw new ConstraintInitializationException("At least one of minOccurs or maxOccurs must be provided.");
105      }
106    }
107
108    private Integer getMinOccurs() {
109      return minOccurs;
110    }
111
112    private Integer getMaxOccurs() {
113      return maxOccurs;
114    }
115
116    @Override
117    protected ICardinalityConstraint newInstance() {
118      return new DefaultCardinalityConstraint(
119          getId(),
120          getFormalName(),
121          getDescription(),
122          ObjectUtils.notNull(getSource()),
123          getLevel(),
124          getTarget(),
125          getProperties(),
126          getMinOccurs(),
127          getMaxOccurs(),
128          getMessage(),
129          getRemarks());
130    }
131  }
132}
